keyword: calories in an 8 oz ribeye steak
title: Calories in an 8 oz Ribeye Steak
meta_description: Learn the calories in an 8 oz ribeye steak, plus full nutrition facts including protein, fat, carbs, and variations for different preparations.
h1: Calories in an 8 oz Ribeye Steak
assumptions: Boneless ribeye steak, choice grade, cooked broiled, trimmed to 0" fat, no added oil, seasonings, or sauces; 8 oz = 227 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cut, grade, cooking method, fat trimming, and brand; values approximate. Check labels or sources when available.

quick_answer.text: An 8 oz ribeye steak provides about 642 kcal and 56 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil per 100 g during cooking
Prime grade (higher marbling) vs choice per 100 g
Fully trimmed lean only (remove all visible fat) per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in an 8 oz ribeye steak?
faqs.a: Approximately 642 kcal for an 8 oz cooked ribeye steak.

faqs.q: How much protein is in an 8 oz ribeye steak?
Is ribeye steak high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 47 g total fat per 8 oz, with 20 g saturated.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect calories in ribeye steak?
faqs.a: Yes, grilling or broiling keeps it lower; pan-frying with oil adds 40+ kcal per tsp.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in an 8 oz ribeye steak?
faqs.a: Zero carbs, zero fiber, and zero sugars.
